channel.title: IOpipe on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in IOpipe on REDtalks.live

item.title: REDtalks.live #50 - Serverless Observability w/ IOpipe
item.description: Episode #50. Wooohooo! And for this landmark 50th episode we’re delighted to have super-popular Serverless observability company, IOpipe, on the show. In this episode (video below) I’m joined by IOpipe founder and CTO, Erica Windisch.
